entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
